n0:createOracleTrigger.n0:source:
CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE TRIGGER "FCERNY"."BSA_TRIGGER_UPDATE_PROJECT_NON_FIXED_SUPPLY" instead of UPDATE on bsa_view_project_non_fixed_supply FOR EACH ROW BEGIN UPDATE bsa_project_non_fixed_quantity_supply SET quantity = :new.quantity WHERE project_id = :new.project_id AND supply_id = :new.supply_id; END;
/ / ALTER TRIGGER "FCERNY"."BSA_TRIGGER_UPDATE_PROJECT_NON_FIXED_SUPPLY" ENABLE;
